data.title: Matching Donations – Pan
data.text:
Our Non-Profit Status Verification

You will likely need to provide the following information about our organization.

Your donation to the Pan Eros Foundation could be doubled with a matching gift from your workplace, and your volunteer hours could also bring in a sizable donation.

Many companies donate money for each hour one of their employees volunteers, and/or match charitable contributions made by their employees. Your employer might be one of them!

Check in with your human resources department to learn how your company prefers to handle matching donations — it’s usually quick and easy!

About the Pan Eros Foundation

We are a 501c3 nonprofit and your gift makes a meaningful impact, allowing us to foster sex-positive culture through education, outreach, arts and more. Please join us and help us achieve our far-reaching mission and long-term goals.

Your donations are tax-deductible to the full extent allowed by the law.

The following companies may match your donations and/or volunteer hours.

Please check with your human resources department to see if your donations and volunteer hours can be matched.

This list is not all-inclusive. Please check with your human resources department to see if your donations and volunteer hours can be matched with donations from your employer.

The Foundation is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit. Your donations make a meaningful impact.
